command.help:
1. /create your listing
2. Send your island name
3. Send your price
4. (Optional) Set max users and notification
5. Send it to a group
You can also send me a contact during the process to give that user management privileges

state.island: (1/3) Send me the name of your island!
state.price: (2/3) Now, please give me the price.
state.notification:
Give me the notification threshold
(eg: 4 - The fourth user will get a private notification).
 0 to disable.

view.notifypin: The island owner will send you the PIN shortly

list.add: You already are, or have been, on the list.
list.remove: I haven't found you on the list. You might have also been on it.
list.create: For some reason, I couldn't add you to the list.

ratelimit: Rate limit exceeded, try again in a few seconds!
nopermission: You don't have permission to perform that action
nousername:
You need a username to use lists.
Have a look in Settings.
